findings.title: Owner can change dividend tracker.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the dividend tracker, which could lead to unintended consequences and potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change Uniswap router address.
findings.description: The owner has privileges to change the Uniswap router address, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fees.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain accounts from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can blacklist addresses.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to blacklist addresses, which may lead to unauthorized restrictions on certain addresses.

findings.title: Owner Can Change Buyback, Marketing and BNB Reward Fees
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify buyback, marketing, and BNB reward fees, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Exclude and Include Addresses in automatedMarketMakerPairs Array
findings.description: The owner has the capability to exclude and include addresses in the automatedMarketMakerPairs array, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change swapTokensAtAmount value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the swapTokensAtAmount value, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can enable/disable swap.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable the swap functionality which could lead to unintended consequences if not properly managed.

findings.title: Owner can change max sell transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum sell transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing, liquidity wallet.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing and liquidity wallet settings.

findings.title: Owner can change gas for processing
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify gas settings for processing.

findings.title: Owner can update claimWait value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to update the claimWait value which could potentially lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change buyBackUpperLimit
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the buyback upper limit.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw contract BNBs.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw contract BNBs, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Out of Gas Exception in excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() Function
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() uses a loop to exclude multiple accounts from fees, which may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.

findings.title: Dividend Tracker Modification
findings.description: The dividend tracker can be changed by the owner, potentially altering the logic of setBalance and other functions without being audited.
